description: Health psychology is a specialty area that focuses on how biology, psychology, behavior, and social factors influence health and illness.

seminarName: Measuring and Modelling our sense of Control
description: In the past decades, sense of control— the feeling that one is in control of one’s actions has gained much scientific interests.
